content.description: As the name suggests, it is a little crumbly at the bottom. This pitch could definitely be lead on gear, but as there are few gear leads in the area, and I was up there regularly for Highlines... enjoy!
content.protection: Seven protection bolts, two bolt anchor with chains and carabiners.
content.location:
This is a zig-zag corner on the south-facing wall, at the north end of the bowl. This can be approached from the top of

Solid Gold

, or

Playin' Hooky

, or if you're high lining, from the gully trail east of the bowl/Creek Side wall.

climbs.name: Haters Gunna Hate
climbs.fa: Matt Lloyd, Jose Rodriguez, Dan Cornella

content.description: This is another short, fun 11. It is still powerful but different from the route to its left. Cool laybacking leads to a crux up high.
content.location: It is the farthest right route on the wall.

climbs.name: Hateraid
climbs.fa: Matt Lloyd, Keith North, Will Gordon

content.description: Hateraid is a short, fun, and powerful route... with a mantel finish. It is a good warm-up for the harder lines at the wall.
content.location:
This is on the right end of the wall just left of "

Haters Gunna Hate

."

content.description:
This 'S' shaped climb follows a line of weakness in the wall to the left of '

Don't Hate

'.

Start up the first two bolts of '

Don't Hate

,' and then follow six more bolts up and to the left. A fun mantle and a steep positive finish make this an enjoyable outing.

FYI: this route is relatively difficult to clean by lowering, it is best to clean on TR.

Enjoy
content.protection:
8 bolts to two bolt anchor with fixed chains.

The 5th bolt is better with a long draw.

content.description: Off the porch-like alcove in Lower Stoked Bowl is a slab that leads to an overhanging arete. Climb the first 6 bolts at easy 5.11 to an awkward to mount ledge for an awesome rest. From here, 2 more bolts protect the V6, progressively steeper and thinner boulder problem. There is a jug to finish and chains with fixed carabiners on top.
content.protection: 8 bolts to 2 bolt anchor with chains and fixed carabiners.

content.description:
This route is rad. Climb through the steep, overhanging wall just right of "

Don't Hate

". Climb up the pillar to a reachy boulder problem, then bust up a thin, pumpy sloper traverse. Shake out, and fire the hard to decipher crux. It can be solved both by dynoing if you're short and bumping if you're tall, either option presents its own issues.
content.location:
It is left of

Hateraid

and right of "

Don't Hate

."
